title: Facebook Open Source Mentorship Program (2018)
subTitle: February 2018 - May 2018
description: Selected in Facebook Open Source 6-week mentorship program. Working on Facebook Instant Articles.

descriptionLinks.data: Fixed bugs in Facebook instant Articles SDK.
Fixed bugs in Facebook Instant Articles Rules Editor.
Created a project using Facebook Docusaurus.

title: Google Summer of Code 2017
subTitle: Result : Sucessfully Completed
description: phpmyadmin has a large number of open issues. To maintain and improve phpmyadmin core project the numbers of issues should be lower down. This project aims to resolving the major issues and improvements to be done in phpmyadmin. I have selected a list of issues on which I will be working during summer.

descriptionLinks.data: PR #13101 - upgraded reCAPTCHA with invisble reCAPTCHA
PR #13073 - Removed inline onmouseover and onmouseout js
PR #13055 - Default collation when creating new database
Issue #13078 - Minified javascript and css files
PR #676 - Added Delete Button in Slideshow (OwnCloud Gallery)
PR #165 - Hide icon-loading-dark after loading the image (NextCloud Gallery)
Developed one sample application during the student application period of GSoC 2016.
Pull Request #23233 - Combined database errors (OwnCloud Core)
